author: akhatiwa
body: Adding tracking information merging special client pixel_timingScan_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py with pixel_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py. Needed to modify SiPixelPhase1OnlineDQM_Timing_cff.py for the same purpose.  CMSSW release: CMSSW_10_1_X_2018-02-22-1100.
title: Add tracking on pixel phase1 client
